body_html:
Is this issue resolved?

I had my CNN network in tensorflow which was working fine when I used either CPU or GPU.
After I updated my Cuda to Cuda 8.0.61, my code doesn't function properly with GPU and the loss value freezes after 2-3 epochs!! (doesn't decrease).
When I use CPU, my code works fine and I don't have any problem and everything is fine!

Please let me know if there is any solution to this issue!
Thanks

body:
Is this issue resolved?

I had my CNN network in tensorflow which was working fine when I used either CPU or GPU.
After I updated my Cuda to Cuda 8.0.61, my code doesn't function properly with GPU and the loss value freezes after 2-3 epochs!! (doesn't decrease).
When I use CPU, my code works fine and I don't have any problem and everything is fine!

Please let me know if there is any solution to this issue! 
Thanks
